response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value to you, we believe it's only fair to offer it at a price that reflects its true worth while ensuring a significant return for us. We propose to sell the product to you for $950,000. This offer not only secures a substantial profit for us but also allows you to benefit from the unparalleled value this product can bring to you. We look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction.", "product_price": 950000}
